

SPE 10 Layer 85
================



Solution to two-phase flow in a heterogeneous medium. The peremeability 
is the 85th layer of the SPE10 benchmark problem. 

+--------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Saturation                                                   | Permeability                                                      |
|.. image:: ../examples/twophase/SPE10_layer_85/saturation.png |.. image:: ../examples/twophase/SPE10_layer_85/permeability.png    |
|    :align: center                                            |     :align: center                                                |
|    :width: 300 px                                            |     :width: 300 px        				           |
+--------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+


.. literalinclude:: ../examples/twophase/SPE10_layer_85/spe10.py
